Description: On I-81 at mile marker 221.5 in the County of Augusta, motorists can expect delays due to an incident. The north right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Other Traffic

Description: On I-64 West in the City of Norfolk, at Hampton Roads Bridge Tunnel West, motorists can expect potential delays due to a bridge/tunnel stoppage.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Bridge/Tunnel Stoppage

Description: On I-81 at mile marker 131 in the County of Roanoke, motorists can expect delays due to a tractor trailer crash. All south lanes are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Tractor Trailer Crash

Description: On Rt. 616 South in the County of Southampton, in the vicinity of General Mahone Blvd; US-460E/W; /PROCTORS BR. RD., motorists can expect delays due to standing water.
Label: Minor Incident - Standing Water - Advisory
